title: Fragment, 1921-22-28, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green cut and uncut velvet on a tan ground originally heavily shot through with fine strips of flat metal. Design of small flowering branches in horizontal rows turning alternately left and right.
